title: Accessibility (Scoreboard) [IAB-4128]: Verify that the Scoreboard will read in games correctly from Left to Right
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed At Bat
AND we have enabled Accessibility
AND we have launched the Application
custom_steps:
WHEN we navigate to the Scoreboard
AND we tap on the various games
custom_expected: THEN the games will correctly be read

title: Accessibility (Gameday) [IAB-4707]: Verify that the Box Score in Gameday is configured for Accessibility
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed At Bat
AND we have enabled Accessibility
AND we have launched the Application
custom_steps:
WHEN we navigate to Gameday
AND we open up Box Score
AND we tap around inside of Box Score
custom_expected: THEN the Box Score will correctly read it's parts through Accessibility

title: Audio [IAB-4520]: Verify that the Volume Slider in the Audio UI doesn't disappear if moving the slider while receiving a phone call
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed At Bat
AND we have launched the Application
custom_steps:
WHEN we navigate to the Scoreboard
AND we navigate to a Live Game which has Audio enabled
AND we tap the Audio Icon
AND Audio starts up
AND we begin moving the Volume Slider left / right
AND a Phone Call comes in while the Volume Slider is being moved
AND the Phone Call is ignored
custom_expected:
THEN the Volume Slider will still be present
AND the user will still be able to slide it left
AND the user will still be able to slider it right

title: Audio [IAB-4602]: Verify that the Audio UI will only display feeds with media_state = "ON"
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed At Bat
AND we have launched the Application
AND there is an Audio Stream set to media_state = "ON"
AND there is an Audio Stream set to media_state = "OFF"
custom_steps: WHEN the user navigates to the Audio UI
custom_expected: THEN the only games displayed will be the ones with media_state = "ON"

title: Audio [IAB-4701]: Verify that if a user has Audio playing and receives a Phone Call while on a low connectivity environment that when they hang up that the application doesn't crash
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed At Bat
AND we have launched the Application
custom_steps:
WHEN we start up Audio 
AND we enter an area where we are getting a 1x / EDGE Connection 
AND we receive a phone call 
OR we decline a phone call
custom_expected: THEN the Application will NOT crash

title: Audio [IAB-4791]:  Gameday Audio 'Connection Error' Issue due to Restore/Purchase
custom_preconds:
Given you have installed an IAP side loaded build (QA or Prod)
And there is a Gameday Audio feed available
custom_steps:
When you Restore/Purchase the app
And you tap on multiple GDA feeds
custom_expected: Then you are able to play GDA feeds with Connection Issues

title: Gameday (Matchup) [IAB-1987]: Verify that the last pitch / out of an inning will appropriately show all the time
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed At Bat
AND we have launched the Application
custom_steps:
WHEN we navigate to Gameday
AND the last pitch of the inning is performed
OR the last out of the inning is performed
custom_expected:
THEN the last pitch of the inning will be displayed correctly
AND the last out of the inning will be displayed correctly

title: Gameday [IAB-2997]: Verify that the "Wrap" appears correctly at the end of a game
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed At Bat
AND we have launched the Application
custom_steps:
WHEN we are on Gameday
AND we watch a game to completion
OR we string a game to just before completion
AND we leave Gameday visible
OR we lock our mobile device
AND we look at our mobile device
custom_expected: THEN we will see that the 'Final' state is reflected correctly on the 'Wrap' screen

title: Gameday: Video Highlights [IAB-4097]: Verify that when we watch a Video Highlight and an Alert appears on top of it without any interaction that the application doesn't crash 30 seconds later
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed At Bat
AND we have launched the Application
custom_steps:
WHEN we navigate to Gameday
AND we start up a Video Highlight
AND we receive an Alert while the Video Highlight is playing
AND we leave the Alert there for at least 30 seconds
custom_expected: THEN the Application will not crash

title: Gameday [IAB-4650]: Verify that the P/AB Matchup window updates appropriately when pushing on a new instance of Gameday for a different game
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed At Bat
AND we have launched the Application
custom_steps:
WHEN we navigate to the Scoreboard
AND there are at least 2 games in the state of 'Live' available
AND we start up Gameday for the 1st Game
AND we swipe the Matchup P/AB to the left where we can see the Deck/Hole player names appear
AND we startup Gameday for the 2nd Game
custom_expected: THEN Gameday will display P/AB redisplays appropriately instead of Deck/Hole

title: Gameday [IAB-4692]: All Star Game - Verify batters show in their appropriate uniforms
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed At Bat
AND we have launched the Application
custom_steps:
WHEN we navigate to Gameday
AND we have the All-Star game available
custom_expected: THEN the players being displayed in Gameday will be wearing their appropriate team uniforms.

title: Gameday [IAB-4717]: Verify when we initially enter into a finalized Gameday game that their is a title of "Wrap" at the top
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed At Bat
AND we have launched the Application
custom_steps:
WHEN we navigate to the Scoreboard
AND we tap on Gameday for any finalized Game for the first time
custom_expected:
THEN we will be brought to the 'Wrap' screen
AND we will see that the word 'Wrap' is visible in the header.

title: Gameday (Plays) [IAB-4723]: Verify that if a player steals home that it appropriately updates and displays the Score in plays
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed At Bat
AND we have launched the Application
custom_steps:
WHEN we navigate to Gameday
AND a player steals 'Home'
custom_expected:
THEN the score will be appropriately displayed in the 'Plays' section
AND the score will be highlighted in 'Red'

title: Scenario [IAB-4682]: Verify that the Single Sign on Restriction message reads appropriately
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have enough devices to cause a Single Sign On restriction
AND we have installed the Application on each device
AND we have launched the Application on each device
custom_steps:
WHEN we hit the login button on the paywall
AND we begin to login with the same account on each device
custom_expected:
THEN we will eventually hit the Single Sign On restriction
AND we will see the header of 'Access Issue'
AND we will see the body of 'Unable to grant access.  Your account has been logged in too many times.  Please try again later.'

title: Scenario [IAB-4730]: Verify that if a user opens the Application, immediately backgrounds it, opens it back up, backgrounds it and brings it up that the Paywall buttons still display
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed At Bat
AND we have NOT launched the Application yet
custom_steps:
WHEN we launch the Application 
AND we immediately background the Application on the Splash Screen 
AND we bring the Application up 
AND we background the Application again 
AND we bring the Application up
custom_expected:
THEN the Paywall will appear
AND the buttons inside the Paywall will display correctly

title: MLB.TV [IAB-3485]: Verify that the Video Player will successfully start up at the Live part of the game consistently
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed At Bat
AND we have launched the Application
custom_steps:
WHEN we have an MLB.TV Stream that is LIVE
AND we start up this particular stream
custom_expected: THEN it will successfully begin at the Live part of the game consistently

title: MLB.TV [IAB-4014] - Verify on a fresh install with no account information stored if we go to a Team Page and select the MLB.TV icon that when we get into the Video Player that it isn't disoriented
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have just freshly installed At Bat
AND we have launched the Application
AND we are utilizing the Lite version of the Application
custom_steps:
WHEN we go to a Teams Home Page
AND that Teams Home Page has an MLB.TV Stream available
AND we tap on that MLB.TV Stream
AND we encounter the Paywall
AND we enter a valid account to get past the Paywall
custom_expected:
THEN the Video Player will open up
AND the Video Player will not have the UI buttons in the center of the screen

title: MLB.TV [IAB-4360]: Verify that we do not encounter an 'Access Issue' when trying to access the 'Free Game of the Day' for the first time through the Paywall Subscriber Login
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed At Bat
AND we have launched the Application
AND we aren't logged in as an Entitled MLB.TV user
custom_steps:
WHEN we tap on a 'Free Game of the Day' link
AND we log in with the credentials of: (mlbtvtest+7@gmail.com / tester)
custom_expected: THEN we will not have any issues accessing the 'Free Game of the Day' feed

title: MLB.TV [IAB-4420]: Verify that an App Entitled user who is watching a 'Free Game of the Day' and attempts to access a Paid Feed through MLB.TV is hit with a Paywall
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed At Bat
AND we have launched the Application
AND we are utilizing an App Entitled Account
custom_steps:
WHEN we start up a 'Free Game of the Day'
AND we attempt to access a paid feed through the MLB.TV interface
custom_expected: THEN we will encounter a Paywall

title: MLB.TV [IAB-4447]: Verify that we can successfully see in-game commercial scores
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed At Bat
AND we have launched the Application
custom_steps:
WHEN we start up an MLB.TV Stream
AND there are in-game commercials available
custom_expected:
THEN we are able to see the transition to the in-game commercials successfully
AND we are able to see the in-game commercials transition back to the game successfully

title: MLB.TV [IAB-4532]: Verify that on the MLB.TV Grid that the 'National Blackout' label is appropriately displayed
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed At Bat
AND we have launched the Application
AND there is a 'National Blackout' game available
custom_steps:
WHEN we navigate to the MLB.TV Grid
AND we navigate to a day that contains at least 1 nationally blacked out game
custom_expected: THEN the 'National Blackout' label will display appropriately

title: MLB.TV [IAB-4542]: Verify that we have the ability to swipe to the "Previous" / "Next" months while on the grid
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed At Bat
AND we have launched the Application
custom_steps:
WHEN we navigate to the MLB.TV grid
AND we swipe to the left
OR we swipe to the right
custom_expected:
THEN the MLB.TV grid will update to the previous day's grid
OR the MLB.TV grid will update to the next day's grid

title: MLB.TV [IAB-4727]: Verify if an App Entitled user selects the 'Free Game of the Day' feed and then attempts to utilize the overlay to switch to a non 'Free' archive that they aren't able to
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed At Bat
AND we have launched the Application
AND we have multiple archive games available
AND at least one of those archive games is a 'Free Game of the Day'
AND we are utilizing just an App-Entitled user
custom_steps:
WHEN we navigate to the MLB.TV grid
AND we navigate to the 'Free Game of the Day' archive
AND we start up that particular archive
AND while inside the Media Player we tap on a non 'Free Game of the Day' archive
custom_expected: THEN we will NOT be able to access any of the non-'Free Game of the Day' archives

title: Settings [IAB-4424]: Verify that adding or removing a Favorite Team doesn't cause the icons to flicker on the 'More' section
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed At Bat
AND we have launched the Application
custom_steps:
WHEN we navigate to the 'More' section
AND we tap on 'Settings'
AND we tap on 'Favorite Teams'
AND we add a 'Favorite Team'
OR we remove a 'Favorite Team'
AND we back out to the 'More' section
custom_expected:
THEN the MLB.com Shop icon will not flicker
AND the Help icon will not flicker

title: Scoreboard [IAB-4494]: Verify that the Scoreboard won't get stuck between days if the user suddenly hits a button while transitioning between days
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed At Bat
AND we have launched the Application
custom_steps:
WHEN we navigate to the Scoreboard
AND we navigate between days
AND we tap on a Tab Bar button to switch off gameday while between the days
AND we tap on the Scoreboard Tab Bar button again
custom_expected: THEN the Scoreboard will NOT be stuck between days

title: Scoreboard [IAB-4668]: Verify that opening the last cell on the iPhone scoreboard doesn't display a funky fresh animation
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed At Bat
AND we have launched the Application
custom_steps:
WHEN we navigate to the Scoreboard
AND we open up the 'Last Cell' on the Scoreboard
custom_expected: THEN their will be NO funky fresh animation displayed

title: Sponsorship & Banners [IAB-4738]: Verify that the Light Sponsorship has the same Ad placements as Free Trial
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed At Bat
AND we have launched the Application
custom_steps:
WHEN we compare the Light Sponsorship
AND we compare the Free Trial sponsorship
custom_expected:
THEN we will see that both contain a Thin top Banner on the Scoreboard
AND we will see that all normal Ad Marvel banners are present as well
AND we will see that both contain the full page interstitial

title: Team Schedules (Calendar) [IAB-4560]: Verify that if a game is set to be TBD (12:33 | 3:33) that it shows as TBD on the Calendar when in a timezone outside of EST (i.e. CST, MST or PST)
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed At Bat
AND we have set our mobile device to using any timezone outside of EST (i.e. CST, MST or PST)
AND we have launched the Application
custom_steps:
WHEN we navigate to the More menu
AND we navigate to the Teams menu
AND we select a Team
AND we select 'Schedules & Results'
AND we select 'Calendar'
AND we navigate to a month that should be showing a TBD for a game
custom_expected: THEN that game will reflect as 'TBD' instead of showing it's time

title: Team Schedules (Calendar) [IAB-4550]: Verify that a Date Month Picker exists in the Team Schedules area
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed At Bat
AND we have launched the Application
custom_steps:
WHEN we navigate to the More menu
AND we navigate to the Teams menu
AND we select a Team
AND we select 'Schedule & Results'
custom_expected: THEN we will see that a Date Picker is available to utilize on the Calendar

title: Team Schedules (Calendar) [IAB-4741]: Verify that the 'All-Star' game displays as 'All-Star' instead of 'All Star'
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed At Bat
AND we have launched the Application
custom_steps:
WHEN we navigate to More
AND we tap on Teams
AND we tap on a Team
AND we tap on 'Schedule & Results'
AND we navigate to July
custom_expected: THEN we will see that the All-Star game displays as 'All-Star' instead of as 'All Star'

AND we have launched the Application
custom_steps:
WHEN we tap on 'More'
AND we tap on 'Teams'
AND we tap on a Team
AND we tap on 'Roster'
AND we tap on a player's name
AND we tap on the 'Stats' tab
AND we tap on hyperlinked year

title: Accessibility (Team Schedules) [IAB-4728]: Verify that Accessibility pronounces the Chicago White Sox, Chicago Cubs & St. Louis Cardinals correctly
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed At Bat
AND we have enabled Accessibility
AND we have launched the Application
custom_steps:
WHEN we navigate to Team Schedules
AND we tap on the Chicago White Sox in various locations
AND we tap on the Chicago Cubs in various locations
AND we tap on the St. Louis Cardinals in various locations
custom_expected:
THEN the Chicago White Sox will has it's name read correctly
AND the Chicago Cubs will have it's team name read correctly
AND the St. Louis Cardinals will have it's team name read correctly

title: Accessibility (Team Schedules) [IAB-4728]: Verify that on a Final Game popover that W reads as "Win", L reads as "Loss" and S reads as "Save"
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed At Bat
AND we have enabled Accessibility
AND we have launched the Application
custom_steps:
WHEN we navigate to the Team Schedule
AND we tap on a random Team to bring up it's schedule
AND we tap on a finalized game to bring up it's popover
AND we tap on 'W'
AND we tap on 'L'
AND we tap on 'S'
custom_expected:
THEN 'W' will read as 'Win'
AND 'L' will read as 'Loss'
AND 'S' will read as 'Save'

title: Audio [IAB-4602]: Verify that the Audio UI will only display feeds with media_state = "ON"
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed At Bat
AND we have launched the Application
AND there is an Audio Stream set to media_state = "ON"
AND there is an Audio Stream set to media_state = "OFF"
custom_steps: WHEN the user navigates to the Audio UI
custom_expected: THEN the only games displayed will be the ones with media_state = "ON"

title: Gameday [IAB-4227]: Verify that "No Scheduled Games" doesn't appear on a day with "Games"
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed At Bat
AND we have launched the Application
custom_steps:
WHEN we open up Gameday initially
AND there are no games being played
AND we tap on the 'Date Picker'
AND we select a day that has games
custom_expected: THEN we will see that 'No Scheduled Games' doesn't appear on a day with games

title: Gameday [IAB-4246]: Verify if we are on Gameday when it's in a 'Warmup' state that the Matchup header properly updates when the game moves into the first
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed At Bat
AND we have launched the Application
custom_steps:
WHEN we navigate to Gameday for a game currently in the state of 'Warmup'
AND the game goes 'Live'
custom_expected:
THEN the Matchup header will properly update to reflect the inning that we're now in
AND the Matchup header will no longer read as 'Warmup'

title: Gameday (Matchup) [IAB-4386]: Verify while utilizing a Retina device that the Compass isn't being cut off when there is a runner on first base

AND we have launched the Application
custom_steps:
WHEN we navigate to Gameday 
AND we switch to the Field View 
AND we place a batter on first place
custom_expected: THEN we will see the compass is NOT being cut off

title: Gameday (Warmup) [IAB-4521]: Verify that when a game goes into Warmup that the 'First Pitch' time is displayed as: 'First Pitch ##:## PM ET'
custom_preconds:

AND we have launched the Application
custom_steps:
WHEN we navigate to a Game in the state of 'Warmup'
AND we navigate to Gameday
custom_expected: THEN the 'First Pitch' time will be displayed as: 'First Pitch ##:## PM ET'

title: Gameday [IAB-4617]: Verify that the Detail view utilizes the correct resolution for it's images
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed At Bat
AND we have launched the Application
custom_steps:
WHEN we navigate to Gameday
AND we navigate to a game that has it's Detail View open at the moment
custom_expected:
THEN the Detail View will show non-retina images at a resolution of 748x340
AND the Detail View will show retina images at a resolution of 1496x680

custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed At Bat
AND we have launched the Application
custom_steps:
WHEN we navigate to Gameday
AND we have the All-Star game available
custom_expected: THEN the players being displayed in Gameday will be wearing their appropriate team uniforms.

title: Gameday [IAB-4718]: Verify that if the Wrap screen is being displayed that we aren't able to swipe in the Box Score from the right
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed At Bat
AND we have launched the Application
custom_steps:
WHEN we navigate to Gameday
AND we tap on a game currently in the state of 'In Progress'
AND we tap on the Box Score on the botton Tab Bar
AND we tap on a game in a state of 'Final'
AND we swipe from right to the center of the screen
custom_expected: THEN we will NOT see the Box Score appear while the Wrap screen is present

title: Gameday [IAB-4722]: Verify that if a game is suspended in the first inning that "X' s don't display in the first inning

AND we have launched the Application
custom_steps:
WHEN we navigate to Gameday
AND we bring up a game that has been suspended in the first inning
custom_expected: THEN we will NOT see "X" s in the Jumbotron scoreboard for the first inning

title: Gameday (Plays) [IAB-4723]: Verify that if a player steals home that it appropriately updates and displays the Score in plays
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed At Bat
AND we have launched the Application
custom_steps:
WHEN we navigate to Gameday
AND we navigate to a game where a runner stole Home
custom_expected:
THEN we will see under 'Plays' that the score appropriately shows up
AND we will see that the score is shown in bolded red

title: Scenario [IAB-3945]: Verify that the In-App Purchase screen doesn't take a long time to display on an EDGE/1X Network
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed At Bat
AND we have launched the Application
AND the user is utilizing an At Bat entitled account
AND the user isn't entitled to MLB.TV
custom_steps:
WHEN the user starts up an MLB.TV Stream
AND the user is utilizing a poor network connection
custom_expected: THEN the Paywall will appear in a timely manner

title: Scenario [IAB-4682]: Verify that the Single Sign on Restriction message reads appropriately
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have enough devices to cause a Single Sign On restriction
AND we have installed the Application on each device
AND we have launched the Application on each device
custom_steps:
WHEN we hit the login button on the paywall
AND we begin to login with the same account on each device
custom_expected:
THEN we will eventually hit the Single Sign On restriction
AND we will see the header of 'Access Issue'
AND we will see the body of 'Unable to grant access. Your account has been logged in too many times. Please try again later.'

title: Scenario (Chase Trial) [IAB-4690]: Verify if we attempt to Register for the Chase 'Free Trial' that an MLB.com header doesn't sit above the login window

AND we have launched the Application
custom_steps:

AND we tap on 'Continue to Lite'
AND we tap on 'Register' for the Chase Free Trial that appears
custom_expected: THEN the MLB.com header will not sit above the login window

title: Data Syncing [IAB-3395]: Verify that if a Pitch Out or Intentional Pitch is thrown outside the box that the pitch trail doesn't break
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed At Bat
AND we have launched the Application
custom_steps:
WHEN we start up an MLB.TV Stream
AND we have Data Syncing enabled
AND there is a Pitch Out
OR there is an Intentional Pitch
AND the pitch is thrown way outside the box
custom_expected:
THEN the pitch trail will not break
AND the pitch trail will look fine

title: Data Syncing [IAB-3837]: Verify  that the overlays update correctly when moving the scrubber around
custom_preconds:

AND we have launched the Application
custom_steps:
WHEN we have an Archive Game playing 
AND we have located a commercial break 
AND we have recorded the timing 
AND we allow an at bat or two to be fully completed 
AND we click the "Previous 30" button the appropriate amount of times to put us back into the commercial break 
OR we click the "Forward" button the appropriate amount of times to put us into the commercial break 
OR we pull the "Scrubber" to the commercial break
custom_expected: THEN the overlay will continue to work correctly

title: MLB.TV [IAB-4727]: Verify if an App Entitled user selects the 'Free Game of the Day' feed and then attempts to utilize the overlay to switch to a non 'Free' archive that they aren't able to
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed At Bat
AND we have launched the Application
AND we have multiple archive games available
AND at least one of those archive games is a 'Free Game of the Day'
AND we are utilizing just an App-Entitled user
custom_steps:
WHEN we navigate to the MLB.TV grid
AND we navigate to the 'Free Game of the Day' archive
AND we start up that particular archive
AND while inside the Media Player we tap on a non 'Free Game of the Day' archive
custom_expected: THEN we will NOT be able to access any of the non-'Free Game of the Day' archives

title: MLB.TV [IAB-4736]: Verify that the 'Play Ball!' screen is formatted correctly and doesn't appear to cut anything off
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed At Bat
AND we have launched the Application
custom_steps:
WHEN we navigate to the MLB.TV grid
AND we start up an archived game
OR we start up a live game
custom_expected:
THEN the 'Play Ball!' screen that appears will be formatted correctly
AND the 'Play Ball!' screen will not appear to cut anything off

title: News [IAB-4316]: Verify that users that have purchased the application do not see ads on new articles
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed At Bat
AND we have launched the Application
AND the user has purchased the application
custom_steps:
WHEN we navigate to News
AND we open up a News Article
custom_expected: THEN we will not see any ads

title: News [IAB-4375]: Verify News Articles with team.com that are shared through an email are able to be opened
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed At Bat
AND we have launched the Application
custom_steps:
WHEN we navigate to the News menu
AND we select a News Article
AND we tap on the Sharing Arrow in the top right corner
AND we select 'Send Article through E-Mail'
AND we open the article on a Local Machine
custom_expected: THEN we will be able to successfully open up the news article that was shared via e-mail

title: News [IAB-4698]: Verify that Ads on the Newsreader rotate every 60 seconds
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed At Bat
AND we have launched the Application
AND we are utilizing an account that can see Ads
custom_steps:
WHEN we navigate to News
AND we look at the Ads that are displayed in the various location of News
custom_expected:
THEN we will see that the Ads will change every 60 seconds
AND we will NOT have to leave the current area of News to see the Ads actually change

title: Scoreboard (Warmup) [IAB-4521]: Verify that when a game goes into Warmup that the 'First Pitch' time is displayed as: 'First Pitch ##:## PM ET'
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed At Bat
AND we have launched the Application
custom_steps: WHEN we navigate to a Game in the state of 'Warmup' on the Scoreboard
custom_expected: THEN the 'First Pitch' time will be displayed as: 'First Pitch ##:## PM ET'

title: Scoreboard [IAB-4617]: Verify that the Detail view utilizes the correct resolution for it's images
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed At Bat
AND we have launched the Application
custom_steps:
WHEN we navigate to the Scoreboard
AND we navigate to a game that has it's Detail View available
custom_expected:
THEN the Detail View will show non-retina images at a resolution of 684x340
AND the Detail View will show retina images at a resolution of 1368x680

title: Scoreboard [IAB-4636]: Verify that if a game has been PPD that it doesn't display Probable Pitchers
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed At Bat
AND we have launched the Application
custom_steps:
WHEN we navigate to the Scoreboard
AND we select a day with a PPD game
custom_expected: THEN the PPD will NOT display the Probable Pitchers

title: Scoreboard [IAB-4735]: Verify when tapping on the Scoreboard menu item multiple times in a low connectivity environment through the MLB.com menu that the application won't crash
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed At Bat
AND we have launched the Application
custom_steps:
WHEN we verify that we are on a carrier network
AND we verify that we have low connectivity
AND we tap the MLB.com menu item
AND we tap the Scoreboard menu item
AND we repeat tapping the MLB.com menu item
AND we repeat tapping the Scoreboard menu item
custom_expected: THEN the Application will not crash

title: Sponsorship & Banners [IAB-4738]: Verify that the Light Sponsorship has the same Ad placements as Free Trial
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed At Bat
AND we have launched the Application
custom_steps:
WHEN we compare the Light Sponsorship
AND we compare the Free Trial sponsorship
custom_expected:
THEN we will see that both contain a Thin top Banner on the Scoreboard
AND we will see that all normal Ad Marvel banners are present as well
AND we will see that both contain the full page interstitial

title: Team Schedules [IAB-4712]: Verify that the Win/Loss shows up for games in final states all the time
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have installed At Bat
AND we have launched the Application
custom_steps:
WHEN we navigate to the Team Schedule menu
AND we look at various games in final states
custom_expected: THEN the games will always show the Win/Loss correctly if they are finalized
